message: does anyone know of a good syntax / filetype plugin for LessCSS?
I'm using ... something that sort of works right now, but indentation and some of the syntax is pretty messed up.
I forgot where I got this from but this works for me: https://github.com/benmills/dotfiles/blob/master/vim/syntax/less.vim
maybe I can fix this by changing some settings
hmmm, thats the one I have already. have you noticed any strange problems with indentation?
alright - it works great with autoindent, smartindent turned on, and cindent and indentexpr turned off. So I just made a ftplugin file for less with those settings.
would you mind making a gist of what you did to make indentation worl @oddbjorn?
i got it pretty much working already... but it is still indenting a bit weird on nested rules
